name: Death's Throw
description:
Throw around your dead inmates (as well as yourself) in order to press buttons, knock out guards, and escape prison. How many will survive when death is useful?

Death's Throw is a short, 1 level game demo created for my uni course. The game was created in 2-3 weeks, with the prompt being "Death is useful".

       ---This game requires a controller to play---

Controls:

Left Joystick to move left and right.

X to pick up and interact.

Right Trigger to throw.

A to jump.

Start (or ESC or keyboard) to pause (or quit on the main menu)

Programs Used:

-Game made in Unreal Engine 4

-Pixel art created in Aseprite

-Music created in BeepBox

-Sounds created/edited in Bfxr and Audacity

-Sounds bitcrushed with dblue bitcrusher by dblue/illformed

(all events and characters are fictional, any similarities to real people or events are merely coincidental)
